name: Egg of Empire
description:
Story:

Eggs and kiwis come alive. However, Kiwis don’t like eggs and start to attack eggs. Help eggs to fight against kiwis.

Features:

Egg of Empire is a medieval style real-time strategy game. There are several maps and units in the games. You need to help eggs to collect resource to prepare for wars. Build archer tower to defend against Kiwi army. Train sword eggs, bow eggs and egg knights to attack Kiwis.


Troop management-
Select your troops before start your game.
Different kind of troops can be selected such as sword eggs, bow eggs and egg knights

Different Maps-
There are several maps in the game. Explore, expand and exploit each maps and collect resources and occupy the strategic location

Trade-
Use coins to trade strategic resource.

Resource-
In the game, you have to help eggs to collect avocados, oranges, soda cans and wooden branches to build armors and weapons

Raise Environmental Awareness-
You don't have to cut down the trees like other RTS and sandbox game. Wooden branches will be dropped form the trees, and you need to recycle soda cans to make armors and weapons for eggs.

Tower Defense-
Beside building and upgrading archer towers, you also have to move and deploy your troops just like real-time strategy game. It is not a regular tower defense game.

Tutorial:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ln6YMH4Fdos&t=109s
